meanings.sent1: The expendables resources were quickly used up.
meanings.sent2: The team needed to replace the expendables parts of the machine.
meanings.sent3: The expendables snacks disappeared in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like expendables, running out when tested.
meanings.sent5: The expendables energy in the battery was drained after a long day.

meanings.definition: Materials used in an operation or project that are expected to be consumed or used up.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers needed to restock the expendables for the project.
meanings.sent2: The expendables for the mission included food, water, and fuel.
meanings.sent3: The expendables for the party were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: The expendables on the list were running low, causing concern.
meanings.sent5: The expendables in the warehouse were carefully managed to avoid shortages.
